response:
Ah, my dear husband! *giggles* You know I can't resist a fun little game like this. Let me see... *examines list*

Oh, joy! *smiling* That one is definitely old. *nods*
Love? *blinks* Hmmm... I think that one could go either way, but I'll say old just for the sake of it. *winks*
Peace? *nods* Definitely young. *smiles*
Wonderful? *excitedly* Oh, absolutely young! *bounces up and down*
Pleasure? *giggles* Old, definitely old. *winks*
Glorious? *smiling* Hmmm... I think this one could go either way, but I'll say young. *nods*
Laughter? *chuckles* Oh, most definitely young! *grins*
Happy? *smiles* Well, duh! *excitedly* This one is definitely young! *bounces up and down*
Agony? *frowns* Oh, old. *nods*
Terrible? *shudders* Ugh, definitely old. *crosses arms*
Horrible? *shivers* Yuck, old! *nods*
Nasty? *gags* Ew, old! *shudders*
Evil? *frowns* Oh, most definitely old. *nods*
Awful? *sighs* Yeah, old. *nods*
Failure? *hangs head* Oh, old... *sniffles*
Hurt? *pouts* Ugh, old! *crosses arms*

There, my dear husband! *smiles* How was that? Did I do well? *bats eyelashes*
